fields.headline: Somewhere for now
fields.bodyText: Europe Germany: Book before January 28 and save up to £50pp on a short break in Berlin with Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333). Three nights at the five-star Hotel Westin Grand in the city centre will cost £411pp (based on two sharing) including return flights from London Heathrow. Denmark : Save £70 on a two-night weekend break in Copenhagen departing January 26 or February 2. The new price of £220pp includes B&B accommodation at the three-star Hotel Copenhagen and return flights from London Heathrow with British Airways. Travelscene (0870 777 4445, www.travelscene.co.uk). Canary Islands : Meon Villas (01730 230370) is cutting the price of some of its Tenerife holidays. Departing January 25, one week at the four-star Villa Risco Prieto Tropicana, Puerto del Carmen, costs £299pp (based on four sharing), a saving of £167pp. Departing February 8, the five-star Villa Calero in Puerto Calero costs £359pp (based on four sharing), a saving of £247pp. Both prices include return flights from London Gatwick, car hire, maid service and food pack. Malta: Eight days' self catering in the Medallion Court Apartments in St Paul's Bay departing February 17 costs £245pp including Manchester flights from and transfers. Belleair Holidays (020-8785 3266). Spain: Seven nights self-catering in the two-star-graded Luxmar apartments, Benidorm, costs £149pp (based on four sharing) from Last Stop Holiday Shop (0541 503405, www.laststop.co.uk). February 2 departure from Gatwick. Asia China: Five nights in Shanghai for £449 including Virgin Atlantic flights from Heathrow, and B&B (based on twin share) at the three-star East China hotel through China Holidays (020-7287 6727, www.chinaholidays.com). Sri Lanka: Somak Holidays (020-8423 3000) is offering a six-night holiday at the Taj Exotica, Bentota, for £889pp (based on twin share) departing February 1. The price includes return flights from Heathrow, transfers and half-board accommodation. Africa Egypt: Save £86 on seven nights at the four-star Luxor Hilton departing January 29. The new price, £399pp, includes return flights from London Gatwick, B&B accommodation and return transfers. British Airways Holidays (0870 2424245). Caribbean Cruise: The price of an eight-day cruise departing February 9 has been cut from £1,255 to £649pp including flights, transfers and full board. The Mistral will visit St Maarten, Trinidad, Barbados, Grenada, St Lucia, Mayreau and Guadeloupe. The Cruise Line (01273 835252, www.cruiseline.co.uk).
